name: PTPG
description:
PTPG

PTPG or Paradock Tile Planet Game is an adventure sandbox game where you can do almost anything that you want with finite capabilities and limitless freedom. You can casually play this game or go mad by adventuring and searching for bugs in the game. PTPG feels more like some 2d Minecraft clone than a Terraria clone.


Explore the 2d procedurally generated finite terrain in the blocky world of PTPG, build structures with the items, or casually search bugs in the game. (I maid just say everything from the first paragraph.)



This game is currently under development. There will be many changes, and features will be over time. Mobs will be surely added in a future update.
